name: nextjs-plus
description: Create a new Next.js application from VS Code with a single click.

commands.title: Next.js Plus: Select Default Project Location

nextjsPlus.defaultLocation.description: Absolute path where projects should be created by default. Leave empty to choose a folder each time. Use the 'Next.js Plus: Select Default Project Location' command to pick a folder via dialog.
nextjsPlus.defaultLocation.markdownDescription:
**Default project location**  
Absolute path to use when creating projects. Leave empty to pick a folder for each project.

> Tip: Run the command `Next.js Plus: Select Default Project Location` to select a folder via dialog.

nextjsPlus.typescript.description: Enable TypeScript support (--typescript). Ignored when 'Prompt for TypeScript' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.typescript.markdownDescription:
**TypeScript**  
Enable TypeScript support (`--typescript`). This value is used unless 'Prompt for TypeScript' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.typescriptPrompt.description: Prompt whether to enable TypeScript every time a project is created.
nextjsPlus.typescriptPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for TypeScript_  
Ask at creation time whether to enable TypeScript, ignoring the saved default.

nextjsPlus.tailwind.description: Include Tailwind CSS configuration (--tailwind). Ignored when 'Prompt for Tailwind CSS' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.tailwind.markdownDescription:
**Tailwind CSS**  
Include Tailwind CSS scaffolding (`--tailwind`). This value is used unless 'Prompt for Tailwind CSS' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.tailwindPrompt.description: Prompt whether to include Tailwind CSS when creating a project.
nextjsPlus.tailwindPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for Tailwind CSS_  
Ask at creation time whether to include Tailwind CSS.

nextjsPlus.eslint.description: Add ESLint configuration (--eslint). Ignored when 'Prompt for ESLint' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.eslint.markdownDescription:
**ESLint**  
Add ESLint configuration (`--eslint`). This value is used unless 'Prompt for ESLint' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.eslintPrompt.description: Prompt whether to add ESLint when creating a project.
nextjsPlus.eslintPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for ESLint_  
Ask at creation time whether to include ESLint.

nextjsPlus.appRouter.description: Use the App Router (--app). Ignored when 'Prompt for App Router' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.appRouter.markdownDescription:
**App Router**  
Generate the App Router structure (`--app`). This value is used unless 'Prompt for App Router' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.appRouterPrompt.description: Prompt whether to use the App Router when creating a project.
nextjsPlus.appRouterPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for App Router_  
Ask at creation time whether to use the App Router.

nextjsPlus.useSrcDirectory.description: Create a dedicated src/ directory (--src-dir). Ignored when 'Prompt for src/ directory' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.useSrcDirectory.markdownDescription:
**Create src/ directory**  
Place generated files inside `src/` (`--src-dir`). This value is used unless 'Prompt for src/ directory' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.srcDirectoryPrompt.description: Prompt whether to create a src/ directory when scaffolding a project.
nextjsPlus.srcDirectoryPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for src/ directory_  
Ask at creation time whether to create a `src/` directory.

nextjsPlus.experimentalApp.description: Enable experimental App Router features (--experimental-app). Ignored when 'Prompt for experimental App features' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.experimentalApp.markdownDescription:
**Experimental App features**  
Enable experimental App Router capabilities (`--experimental-app`). This value is used unless 'Prompt for experimental App features' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.experimentalAppPrompt.description: Prompt whether to enable experimental App Router features.
nextjsPlus.experimentalAppPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for experimental App features_  
Ask at creation time whether to enable experimental App Router capabilities.

nextjsPlus.turbopack.description: Use Turbopack for development (--turbopack). Ignored when 'Prompt for Turbopack' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.turbopack.markdownDescription:
**Turbopack**  
Use Turbopack for the development server (`--turbopack`). This value is used unless 'Prompt for Turbopack' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.turbopackPrompt.description: Prompt whether to use Turbopack when creating a project.
nextjsPlus.turbopackPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for Turbopack_  
Ask at creation time whether to run the dev server with Turbopack.

nextjsPlus.reactCompiler.description: Enable the experimental React Compiler (--react-compiler). Ignored when 'Prompt for React Compiler' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.reactCompiler.markdownDescription:
**React Compiler**  
Enable the experimental React Compiler (`--react-compiler`). This value is used unless 'Prompt for React Compiler' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.reactCompilerPrompt.description: Prompt whether to enable the experimental React Compiler.
nextjsPlus.reactCompilerPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for React Compiler_  
Ask at creation time whether to enable the experimental React Compiler.

nextjsPlus.importAlias.description: Set the import alias passed to create-next-app (--import-alias). Ignored when 'Prompt for import alias' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.importAlias.markdownDescription:
**Import alias**  
Defines the import alias passed to Create Next App (`--import-alias`). This value is used unless 'Prompt for import alias' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.importAliasPrompt.description: Prompt for the import alias to use when creating a project.
nextjsPlus.importAliasPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for import alias_  
Ask at creation time which import alias to use.

nextjsPlus.shadcnInit.description: Run shadcn/ui initialization (`npx shadcn@latest init`) after creating the project. Ignored when 'Prompt for shadcn init' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.shadcnInit.markdownDescription:
**shadcn init**  
Run `npx shadcn@latest init` inside the new project right after scaffolding. This value is used unless 'Prompt for shadcn init' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.shadcnInitPrompt.description: Prompt whether to run shadcn/ui init after each project is created.
nextjsPlus.shadcnInitPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for shadcn init_  
Ask at creation time whether to run `npx shadcn@latest init`.

nextjsPlus.shadcnInstallAll.description: Install all shadcn/ui components (`npx shadcn@latest add --all`) after initialization. Ignored when 'Prompt for shadcn components' is enabled.
nextjsPlus.shadcnInstallAll.markdownDescription:
**Install all shadcn components**  
Run `npx shadcn@latest add --all` after initialization to pull in every component. This value is used unless 'Prompt for shadcn components' is enabled.

nextjsPlus.shadcnInstallAllPrompt.description: Prompt whether to install all shadcn/ui components after each project is created.
nextjsPlus.shadcnInstallAllPrompt.markdownDescription:
_Prompt for shadcn components_  
Ask at creation time whether to run `npx shadcn@latest add --all`.

nextjsPlus.openInNewWindow.description: Open the generated project in a new VS Code window after scaffolding.
nextjsPlus.openInNewWindow.markdownDescription:
**Open in new window**  
Automatically open the generated project in a new VS Code window once scaffolding completes.
